product_name: CAVIAR Anti-Aging® Infinite Color Hold Conditioner

product_name: CAVIAR Anti-Aging® Infinite Color Hold Dual-Use Serum
ingredients:
-Red Raspberry Leaf Oil and Sunflower Seed Oil: Replenishes natural lipid layer of the hair holding in color pigment and moisture.  
-Vitamins A, C, and E: Help reduce exposure to free radicals which causes oxidation to the hair fiber.   
-Caviar Extract: Helps smooth the hair shaft and increase shine with amino acids and omega-3 fatty acids.
-Age-control Complex: Addresses natural, chemical, and environmental aging; helps smooth the hair strand and increase shine with caviar extract and vitamin C.

product_name: CAVIAR Anti-Aging® Replenishing Moisture Masque
ingredients:
-Age-Control Complex®: Combats chronological, chemical, and environmental aging.-Enzymetherapy®: A core Alterna technology found in each of the brand's products helps transform ingredients into a micro-structure that the hair can more easily absorb, allowing for deeper more targeted penetration of active ingredients.-Color Hold®: Infuses hair with plant-derived melanin for extreme color protection and the prevention of color washout. Protects hair from UVA UVB and visible light including artificial light sources.-Seasilk®: A blend of marine botanicals including different algae and seaweeds that provides exceptional moisture protection and helps repair damaged hair.
